channel.title: Nostalgia on Vishnu Bharathi
channel.description: Recent content in Nostalgia on Vishnu Bharathi

item.title: The Beginnings
item.description: A few years back (around 2013), when I was still in college I started noticing few people sharing links to very interesting projects in my facebook feed. All the links pointed to this site called github.com. I was thrilled to open and read the README.md files every time I get the link to a project. During those days, the best place to get software was sourceforge. At first, I didn’t quite get what GitHub is.
